feed.title: Hemmelig Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.5.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Dutch by @ltguillaume in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/385
  • fix: the dropdown bg by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/383

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.5.4...v6.5.5

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(prehandler): block bots / crawlers / spiders from fetching secrets from the API by default by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/388
  • feat(secrets): Ensure atomic read and delete operations for secrets by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/387 d270533 - chore: remove console log <@bjarneo> d203bfc - chore: scroll top on create new <@bjarneo> efff66f - chore: increase the timeout before scroll <@bjarneo> 11ea4f1 - fix: a minor hack to blur the quill input so the page do not jump <@bjarneo> 16bf7c3 - chore: adjust the layout <@bjarneo> 4233b90 - chore: expand the tracking to all pages <@bjarneo> fc40ba8 - chore: a hack to scroll to the bottom of the page to sharing details after secret creation <@bjarneo> fb8cb60 - chore: fix heading colors <@bjarneo> b226380 - chore: fix border focus color <@bjarneo>

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.5.5...v6.6.0

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: reduce the docker image size by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/392

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.6.0...v6.6.1

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.7.0 - The Tip Tap Editor
entry.content:
The new editor: https://tiptap.dev/docs

What's Changed

  • Minor fixes in the French translation by @2franix in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/397
  • feat: replace quill with the tiptap editor by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/400

48bacf8 - fix: remove the rm rf <@bjarneo> 50b6cdf - fix: add burger menu for mobile <@bjarneo> 2986b78 - fix: remove the rm rf <@bjarneo> 2b93a16 - chore: update the copy icons <@bjarneo>

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.6.1...v6.7.0
